title: Refunds
body:
When I first started playing earlier in the year I found Refunds and since it did not specify that its just 3 forever in the client I ended up wasting 2 on refunding IP purchases of the champions Alistar{{champion:12}}  and Poppy{{champion:78}} . 
I know now that is says its the only 3 you'll ever get, I was hoping I could get the first 2 back since I have bought the champions Alistar and Poppy with IP again now. (This is probably just a waste of time but I was told it would be worth posting on the boards.) 

It would also be great if it was clarified in client that the 3 refunds are your only 3, so hopefully my idiocy isn't repeated by people in the future.

replies.body:
Each account is only provided with those 3 refunds, so unfortunately, I cannot provide you any additional refunds, sorry. :/

Also, I wanted to mention that the new client has the functionality you're hinting at, where it specifically states how many refunds are available, as shown below:

http://image.prntscr.com/image/21265954c5b84358b1be3f4eee41b31f.png

Let me know if you have any other questions.
